_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The process of growing disillusioned wit: Properly attend to the six sense objects
Truly see the impermanence of the six sense objects
When a mendicant does this, they grow disillusioned with the six sense objects
The process of ending relishing and gree: The mind is said to be well freed
